abstract: In its debut season, "Boardwalk Empire" was nominated for 18 Emmy Awards and won eight, including a trophy for the direction of its pilot episode, which was handled by Martin Scorsese.
snippet: In its debut season, "Boardwalk Empire" was nominated for 18 Emmy Awards and won eight, including a trophy for the direction of its pilot episode, which was handled by Martin Scorsese.

headline.main: HBO Orders Third Season of 'Boardwalk Empire'
